Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Motormaster jumps back from the lock of weapons, and swings his sword wide
in and ark towards Megatron. Megatron is not able to get his mace up in
time, and receives the blade, as it plunges into his neck. A grinding of
Metal against Metal can be heard, and Motormaster strains, his arms heating
up from the amount of energy used, to try to finish the stroke cleanly,
through Megatron's head.

The sword opens a small wound, and as oil starts to produce, it continues.
Megatron finally brings the mace, in a wide swing, and hits Motormaster
head on, the impact sending the Stunticon leader into the star ship, and
the small part caves in. Megatron replaces his mace with his hand again,
and steps forward. "Give it up Motormaster."

For a moment there is silence, then the ruble comes to life, and
Motormaster lunges out of it, bringing fist after fist into Megatrons
chest. The Slagmaker doubles back from the pain, and tries to put his hands
up, but Motormaster puts his fists together, and rocks Megatron with an Axe
like blow across the jaw, then again across the jaw, in an upward stroke,
sending Megatron back several 100 feet, and into the foilage. Motormaster
transforms, and follows his would be fake leader.
